description:
Having survived the bandit attack, Merowlink now learns that General Helmetione is Lulusy`s uncle, and that she has her own grudges against him. The two of them flee to an abandoned city, and soon must face an elite special forces unit led by Major Boyle, formerly of the Planbandol battalion. This may be a fight that Merowlink isn`t prepared to win.
Source: TMDB
